column4: hi, I need to edit the registry on my windows partition from ubuntu. Is there a tool for this?
sounds dangerous.  Even if you found a tool, to save your settings you'd have to write to the NTFS partition (if it's not FAT) which is experimental at best
my windows install is broken and editing the registry is the only way to fix it
if you say so.  You could just install windows again without deleting the data if that's what you're concerned about
